name: Dusk Oracle
text: The spirits of the dead hold the accumulated lore of all creatures that once lived. Through the art of the dusk oracle, you have learned to call forth the ephemeral shades of the dead to answer questions and help you battle your foes. Whether you are a character capable of tapping into these endless memories or an empathic mortal called upon by the gods, your search for knowledge is guided by the whispers of the dead.

features.foreseenHit(11thLevel): You gain the foreseen hit power
features.oracle'sInsight(11thLevel): You can ask the corpse of any intelligent creature a single question and receive an answer
features.predictedAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an attack, the attack is against the lowest of each targetâ€™s Fortitude, Reflex, or Will
features.predictedOutcome(12thLevel): You gain the predicted outcome power
features.oracularInsight(16thLevel): While you have combat advantage against an enemy, any resistance it has against your attacks is reduced by 10
features.foreseenBattle(20thLevel): You gain the foreseen battle power
